name: SV Paquetá
description:
Bubbles, Noodles and Fitzwilliams got into a storm on the vessel SV Paquetá on their way home and must now throw away most of their baggage to make the boat lighter. Decide what to keep and what to throw away.

Made for Global Game Jam 2019 by:
Natália Amorim
Marina Bianchetti
Noaue Bittencourt
Raissa Studart
supervelociraptor

as umunum collective

fonts:
TimesNewPixel by CharlieScharp
LastPriestess by christinaNeofotistou

CompassPro by Eeve Somepx
16bfZX by petrnit

color palette mail24
